alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:30AM CDT until July 28 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Dawson County in south central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1228 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eddyville to 11 miles southwest of Willow Island to Moorefield to near Wellfleet, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Overton and Loomis. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 252. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
